[Home](./index.md) &gt; [flipclock](./flipclock.md)

## flipclock package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Alphanumeric](./flipclock.alphanumeric.md) | This face is designed to flip through alphanumeric values similar to a flip board at a train station. The value will incrementally/decrementally flip the digits until it reaches the target. |
|  [Clock](./flipclock.clock.md) | This face will show a clock in a given format. |
|  [Counter](./flipclock.counter.md) | This face is designed to increment and decrement values. Usually this face is used as a counter for 0, 1, 2, 3, 4 (etc) for something like page views. |
|  [ElapsedTime](./flipclock.elapsedtime.md) | This face will show the amount of time elapsed since the given value and display it a specific format. For example 'hh:mm:ss' will show the elapsed time in hours, minutes, seconds. |
|  [EventEmitter](./flipclock.eventemitter.md) | An event emitter to facilitate emitter and listening for events. |
|  [FaceValue](./flipclock.facevalue.md) | The FaceValue class digitizes the raw value and so it can be used by the clock face. |
|  [FlipClock](./flipclock.flipclock.md) | The FlipClock class starts, stops, resets, mounts, and unmounts the clock. The clock also tracks the time and renders the clock with each interval. |
|  [Timer](./flipclock.timer.md) | The Timer class uses a requestAnimationFrame loop to build a timer that can start and stop. |
